    def c32, 0.5, 65280, 255, -32768
    def c31, 1, -1, 0, 2

    dcl_2d s0

    dcl_texcoord1 o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 o3
    dcl_texcoord6 o4
    dcl_texcoord7 o5
    dcl_position o6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mul r0, c23.wwyy, v0.xyxy
    mad r1, r0.yxxy, c31.xxyy, c31.zzxx
    add r2, r1, r1
    add r0.x, v0.y, v0.x
    slt r0.x, c23.z, r0.x
    slt r0.y, v0.x, v0.y
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c31.w, r0.y
    mad r1, r1, -c31.w, c31.x
    mul r1, r1, c24
    mad r1, r2, c23.x, r1
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    dp4 r0.x, r1, c27[a0.x]
    frc r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.y, r0.x
    mov r1, c27
    if_lt c23.x, r1.x
      add r2.x, r0.y, -c22.x
      add r2.y, r0.x, c27.x
      mul r2.x, r2.y, r2.x
      add_sat r2.x, r2.x, r2.x

      add r0.y, r0.y, -c22.x
      mul_sat r2.x, r0.y, c22.y
    endif
    exp r0.y, -r0.x
    mad r3.xy, c25.x, r0.y, -r1.x
    add r0.y, -r0.x, -c27.x
    exp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, c25.x
    max r0.y, r0.y, c31.w
    add r3.zw, r0.y, -c27.x
    mul r3, r3, c25.y
    mad r4, r0.zwzw, r3, c32.x
    frc r5, r4
    add r4, r4, -r5
    rcp r0.y, r3.y
    mul r3.xy, r0.y, r4
    mad r0.yz, r3.xxyw, c21.xxyw, c21.xzww
    mov r4.xy, c21
    mad r5.xy, r4, c32.x, r0.yzzw
    add r5.w, r0.x, -c22.z
    mov r5.z, c27.w
    texldl r0, r5, s0
    mul r0.xy, r0, c32.yzzw
    add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, r0.x, c32.w
    mul r3.z, r0.x, c33.x
    rcp r0.x, r3.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r4.zwzw
    mad r2.yz, r0.xxyw, c21.xxyw, c21.xzww
    mad r6.xy, r4, c32.x, r2.yzzw
    add r6.zw, r5, c27.xyyx
    texldl r5, r6, s0
    mul r2.yz, r5.xxyw, c32
    add r0.w, r2.z, r2.y
    add r0.w, r0.w, c32.w
    mul r0.z, r0.w, c33.x
    lrp r5.xyz, r2.x, r0, r3
    mul r0, r5.y, c7
    mad r0, c6, r5.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, r5.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c9
    add r2.xyz, -r0, c26
    mul r3.xyz, r2.y, c15
    mad r3.xyz, c14, r2.x, r3
    mad o2.xyz, c16, r2.z, r3
    mul o3.xyz, r2, c26.w
    mul r2, r0.y, c1
    mad r2, c0, r0.x, r2
    mad r2, c2, r0.z, r2
    mad r2, c3, r0.w, r2
    mul r3.x, r2.w, c17.z
    mad r2.xy, r3.x, c17, r2
    mad r3.xy, r5, c21, c21.zwzw
    mad o0.xy, r4, c32.x, r3
    mad r1, c18.xyzx, r1.xxxw, r1.yyzx
    add r1, r0, -r1
    mul r3.xy, r1.y, c11
    mad r1.xy, c10, r1.x, r3
    mad r1.xy, c12, r1.z, r1
    mad r1.xy, c13, r1.w, r1
    add r1.xy, -r1, c19
    add o1.xy, r1, c32.x
    add r1.xyz, -r0, c18
    dp3 o1.w, r1, c20
    mad r0.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r1.xyz, r0.y, c15
    mad r0.xyw, c14.xyzz, r0.x, r1.xyzz
    mad o4.xyz, c16, r0.z, r0.xyww
    mov o0.z, c27.w
    mov o1.z, c27.x

    mov o5, r2
